TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract INoCopySpan implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: This interface should be added to a span object that should not be copied into a new Spenned when performing a slice or copy operation on the original Spanned it was placed in.

remarks.para: This interface should be added to a span object that should not be copied into a new Spenned when performing a slice or copy operation on the original Spanned it was placed in.
